Artist heard Lunarpines call and started to run off. Deemos followed him.
Artist ran next to Lunarpine. Deemos seen Shadow Wing and started to laugh.
The pod that opened was nearby. A large Wasp came out.

"Bot hurt as soon as I arive?" The Wasp bot asks...
----- Original Message -----
From: <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2000 1:28 PM
Subject: Re: Don't die yet Wing!!!!


Lunarpine dashed down the hillside to Shadow Wings side, she was
pretty badly beaten (To put it lightly. He croutched at her side,
again he'd failed in his mission and someone got hurt. The wolfbot
raised his claws realizing he had to act fast if there was any hope
of reviving her spark "Computer prepare to activate internal repairs "

"No damage indicated" was the reply. Lunarpine brought his claws down
slashing himself across the chest.

He reached in grabbing live wires attempting to hook them through
Shadow Wings system as well as his own. It was a long shot but the
way he saw it it was his only shot there was a chance that his spark
could join the matrix along with hers. The wolfbot would rather spend
eternity in the matrix with her than spend one more moment on ancient
earth without her.

He opened his mouth one more time, "Anyone nearby please help us."
With those last desperate words Lunarpine collapsed into stasis lock
atop the motionless body of Shadow Wing.

(Posibilities 1Shadow Wing is saved 2Shadow Wings spark is stored in
Lunarpines body for future reference 3 Both are trapped inside the
Matrix. 4 Both remain in stasis lock for future reference. 5 anything
Logo can think of.)

Forget about this part of the post, I found the retreat after I wrote
it.
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> OK here I go again
>
 > 12034 Lunarpine charges downhill fireing at Serpentor as he goes.
